name: Marin County Free Library Digital Resources
description: Free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with Marin County library card
fullDescription: Marin County Free Library provides free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, streaming media, and learning platforms for cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks via Libby
- Streaming video and music
- Online learning platforms
- Research databases
- Digital magazines and newspapers
- Language learning
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Marin County Free Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit marinlibrary.org/resource
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
